availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles H. Hubbard (Hopkins Co., KY, farmer, private)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Hopkins County, Kentucky, native. Married to Leah Wade Hubbard in Hopkins County on December 31, 1856. Father of Francis J. Hubbard, Martha E. Hubbard, William Hubbard, and Charles Hubbard. Farm laborer in Hopkins County in 1860. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1863. Served in the 17th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Infantry (U.S.A.) as a private from January 3, 1865, to September 20, 1865.
